main event: Three bright white, oval-shaped lights were observed hovering and then disappearing over Pine Mountain, Georgia on September 6.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 10 to 15 minutes., The lights were initially stationary before they started moving more rapidly., The objects were described as bright and white., The report mentions no photographs were taken of the sighting., The origins of the report relate to Project Blue Book, a US Air Force program investigating UFOs.
witness description: No witnesses are confirmed in the record.
